data: There was not a person in Old Chester less tainted by the vulgarity of secretiveness than Miss Lydia Sampson.
THERE was not a person in Old Chester less tainted by the vulgarity of secretiveness than Miss Lydia Sampson.
Deland, Margaret Wade Campbell, 1857-1945; Taylor, F. Walter (Frank Walter), 1874-1921 [Illustrator]
